message.body: I know. My heart is completely broken. No thanks needed - we'll talk soon.
I am hugging you and mark from here too.
Thanks. Apparently they took him off the machine but his heart kept going which was unexpected. So he's fighting back. I'm not sure there's much hope but we can hold onto it for now.
I will definitely hope to the max until whatever the next thing is happens.
Once I am in touch with her I'll update you. Thanks for checking. We are just still in shock.
